snippet: A fan who didn't want to miss one play of the Super Bowl, a Valentine's Day party at a bathhouse in Brooklyn, and other news from around the city.
abstract: A fan who didn't want to miss one play of the Super Bowl, a Valentine's Day party at a bathhouse in Brooklyn, and other news from around the city.
lead_paragraph: For more local news from The Times, including the Super Bowl Sunday salsa instructor who gave props to Victor Cruz; the opening of a speakeasy-style nightclub downstairs from the former Studio 54; the shoes that were thrown at the Yemeni president, Ali Adbullah Saleh, during a Sunday protest; and a look at how the current state Regents exam appears to be the easiest in memory, see the N.Y./Region section.
